messages.subject: FW: New UnschoolSwap group
messages.msgSnippet: Bad link!  It should have been: HYPERLINK http://finance.groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolswap http://finance.group s.yahoo.com/group/unschoolswap Q ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Bad link! It should have been:
HYPERLINK
"http://finance.groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolswap"http://finance.group
s.yahoo.com/group/unschoolswap
Q
-----Original Message-----
From: Queana [mailto:queana7@...]
Sent: Sunday, January 23, 2005 7:53 PM
To: 'unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com';
'liveandlearnconference@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: New UnschoolSwap group



Please check out this new yahoo group just formed!
HYPERLINK
"http://finance.groups.yahoo.com/unschoolswap"http://finance.groups.yaho
o.com/unschoolswap

Please post items you are willing to sell or trade that may be of
interest to an unschooling or homeschooling family. **NO CURRICULUM**
**NO CLOTHING OR HOUSEHOLD ITEMS**
There are plenty of groups and places to find that!
Toys
Games
Music
Books ("living" or "twaddle", not "school")
All transactions are between you and the seller/trader. We take no
responsibility for verifying anybody's trustworthiness. Use caution when
purchasing or trading via the internet!

Q
